apps.name: Spotify++
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ is a modified version of Spotify that provides additional features such as unlimited skips, no ads, and the ability to download songs for offline listening. Enjoy your music without any interruptions.


More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

• Unlimited Skips
No more restrictions on the number of skips.
• No Ads
Enjoy your music without any interruptions from ads.
• Offline Downloads
Download your favorite songs and listen offline.
• High-Quality Audio
Stream and download music in high quality.
• Custom Themes
Customize the look of Spotify++ with different themes.
• Free and Open Source
Spotify++ is free and open source.
• Easy to Use
Simple and intuitive user interface.

versions.localizedDescription:
## Highlights
* Added support for high-quality audio streaming.
* Improved offline download feature.
* Custom themes are now available.

## Changes (v1.2.3)
* Localization: Updated Japanese.
* Localization: Updated Chinese (Simplified + Traditional).
* Localization: Updated Italian.
* Fixed an issue where the app would crash on startup.
* Improved user interface for better usability.

apps.subtitle: Enhanced Spotify Experience
